summary: Frontend testing completed for Flux AI Productivity OS. Tested council feedback on sticky notes, chat modal close button, routine builder widget, and basic navigation. All core features working as expected.

council_feedback_on_sticky_notes.details: Created sticky note via right-click context menu, added text, clicked Users icon, selected council member (Violet), received mocked AI feedback successfully. The functions.invoke mock for 'flux-ai' with type 'note-review' is working correctly.

slider_widget_drag_isolation.details: The slider.tsx component has stopPropagation on onPointerDown and onMouseDown events to prevent widget drag. Code implementation is correct. Visual testing showed slider is present in Video Audio widget.

chat_modal_close_button.details: CollabMessagesModal (Team Messages) has only ONE visible close button. The default dialog close button is hidden via CSS [&>button[class*='absolute']]:hidden. Found 2 buttons in DOM but only 1 is visible (second has 0x0 dimensions).

routine_builder_widget.details: Routine Builder widget appears when toggled from Tools menu. Shows '0% today' progress bar and 'No routines yet' placeholder. Widget is correctly added to activeWidgets.

basic_navigation.details: Home, The Council, and Inbox navigation all working. The Council page shows 5 council members (Violet, Leaf, Rose, Blue, Sunny) with submit form.

critical_code_review_comments: Slider stopPropagation implementation in slider.tsx (lines 13-14) correctly prevents event bubbling to parent draggable widget
CollabMessagesModal uses proper CSS to hide default dialog close button
Mock supabase client functions.invoke handles 'note-review' type for council feedback successfully
test_credentials: None - app uses mocked authentication with mockUser 'user@flux.local'
context_for_next_testing_agent: All mocked APIs are working: supabase.from(), supabase.auth, supabase.functions.invoke(). The council feedback feature uses functions.invoke('flux-ai') with body.type='note-review'. Sticky notes accessible via right-click > New Sticky Note or Tools > Notes toggle.

mocked_apis_verified.supabase.functions.invoke(): Working - returns mocked AI responses for 'flux-ai' function
